title: Leading gaming content on Twitch H1 2019 , by hours watched
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
The highest Games League of Legends has 393.8 more Number of hours watched than the lowest Games World of Warcraft.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Games in the x axis and Number of hours watched in the y axis.
The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours watched for 10 number of Gamess.
The Number of hours watched is highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
The highest Games League of Legends has 393.8 more Number of hours watched than the lowest Games World of Warcraft.
Games League of Legends is higher than any other Gamess with value 512.3, followed by , and Just Chatting. Down to Games World of Warcraft with the lowest value 118.5.
The lowest value 118.5 at World of Warcraft is almost 1.98 times smaller than the average value 258.19.
The Number of hours watched is 2581.9 if we add up values of all Gamess.
